text: Yakshcho vony prohanyayutʹ, my ne poslaly vam yak yikhniy okhoronetsʹ. Vasha yedyna misiya dostavlyaye povidomlennya. Koly my zlyva lyudsʹki istoty z myloserdyam, vony stayutʹ hordym, ta koly neshchastya afflicts yim, yak naslidok yikhnikh vlasnykh sprav, lyudsʹki istoty povertayutʹ u disbelievers
